title: The six drivers who took their maiden F1 win at the Canadian GP
summary: Montreal has seen six drivers claim their maiden F1 win at the circuit. Some went on to become the greatest drivers the sport has ever seen. But for others, it would be the highlight of their careers

qa_pairs.question: Which famous circuit is known for hosting the first F1 wins of multiple drivers?
What can be a significant career milestone for Formula 1 drivers during a race?
Which of the following drivers is known for having won their first race at the Canadian Grand Prix?
